Invoking libraries that we need in this assignment.

```{r}

library(tidyverse)
library(nycflights13)


```

Let's take a look what we have in the dataset.

```{r}

planes %>%
  glimpse()


```



## Number of planes that have turbo-jet engine with manufacturer detailed


```{r}

planes %>%
  filter(engine == "Turbo-jet")%>%
  group_by(manufacturer, model) %>%
  summarise(count=n()) %>%
  arrange(desc(count),manufacturer)

```

## Number of planes manufactured by aircraft companies with age detailed

```{r}

planes%>%
  group_by(manufacturer)%>%
  summarise(count = n(), avg_age = mean(2022-year,na.rm = T))%>%
  arrange(desc(count),avg_age) %>%
  print(n= Inf)

```
